data.question: About how much money would you like to spend on the phone ?
Are there some phone brands that you specially like ?
Are there some phone brands that you specially dislike ?
Will you use your phone for work ?
How much do you want to play games on your phone ?
choices: I do not want to play games at all

data.question: Do you often connect devices via Bluetooth ?
How often do you plan to watch videos or movies on your phone (for example on YouTube or Netflix) ?
choices: I want to watch videos or movies every day
I occasionally want to watch videos or movies
I almost never watch videos on my phone

data.question: How critical is the quality of the pictures which you will take with your phone camera?
choices: I will use the pictures of my phone for professional purposes
I want to have a very good camera so I can upload and save high quality pictures
I want to have a good camera so I can share my pictures with my friends
I don’t care about camera quality

data.question: Are you planning to have more than one phone number on the same phone (e.g. one work number, one personal number)?
Which of these features are really important for you ?
choices: The phone should be extremely lightweight
The phone should be able to recognize my face
The phone should be able to recognize my fingerprints
